msbt.message: Hello? Oh, hey, it's Harvey. I'm calling on the phone part of your phone.

I forgot to tell you something when you were at Photopia. Go figure, right? Hahaha! What I wanted to tell you was about any models you invited to the studio.After you introduced us, I thought I'd take a nice portrait and turn it into a poster. Hope you like it!
You used an amiibo for a model that couldn't make it, but we'll just go ahead and make a poster anyhow.
I set it up with Nook Shopping so you can order through them, so, uh, please order some!
Alrighty then, I think that's about it. Hope you visit Harv's Island again sometime soon! Bye now.
Hello Wait, did I call you? Ah, this is Harvey. How did you like Photopia?

Over at Photopia I think you used an amiibo for a model that couldn't make it I sympathize, bud. But I've made connections that can make posters of folks too busy to visit. Since no one visits meYou can get ahold of 'em through Nook Shopping, just like anyone else's posters, so take a look!
That's all I can remember wanting to talk about, but feel free to visit Harv's Island anytime you feel like it!

So, hey, I know this is out of the blue and everything, but I, likemiiiiiiiight need kind of a favor.I've got some real sweet folks here who want some special photos made. I could use an extra paw if that's OK.Wait, you have hands, don't you? You can bring those too.Think you could ramble your way to Photopia and help a shutterdog out? I'll fill you in when you get here.
To get to Photopia, go to the airport and let 'em know you wanna go to Harv's Island. OK, I'll see you soon.
Alright, NOW that's everything. Except forno, wait, yeah. That's definitely everything. Oh!
Oh, wait! Right! There's this other thing
